name: Field_getKeyTest
description: Unit tests for the getKey method in the Field class.

test_cases.name: testGetKey_KeyIsNull
test_cases.description: Tests the getKey method when the key is null, ensuring it constructs the key correctly.

test_cases.name: testGetKey_KeyIsNotNull
test_cases.description: Tests the getKey method when the key is not null, ensuring it returns the existing key.
